The Last Coin: We have one coin left and I have to decide what to do with it.
Performing for the Streets: Brother wants me to dance while he plays his flute in hopes of earning some money.
The Family Watch: Brothers watch got thrown into the ocean by the Roosh brothers! Sailor Pete scared off the brothers and says he has something to help.
Necklace Overboard: Woke up. Brother must be in town.

Performing for the Streets: The Roosh brothers showed up and chased brother! I need to follow.
The Family Watch: Pete is letting us, or me anyways, use his suit to dive underwater and get the watch back.
A crab crawled out from behind a rock and snatched the watch!
I got the watch back and can return to brother.
